name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 21, the Chinese who went to Russia to join the army posted another video to complain: "The Russians asked us to pull stones in the middle of the night, and we had to pull two more trucks. It was too tiring," "Eating this "pig food" all day long makes me lose energy in training. It can't be compared with the food in the Chinese army."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 21, Huludao, Liaoning. Xinglong Family Commercial Complex has been unfinished for ten years, and the owners are defending their rights in front of the government building.
December 21, Zibo, Shandong. Lijin Group's financial products collapsed, and investors were taken away by the police for defending their rights.
December 21, Shandong. Heda Xingfucheng real estate was delayed in delivery, and the owners held banners in front of the government gate to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 21, at Guangzhou South Railway Station, a passenger was caught and dragged by the high-speed train door while the train was preparing to accelerate.
The station attendant ran towards the passenger and contacted the driver, and the high-speed train finally braked successfully and the passenger was rescued.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a reporter found that some of the products in the Russian product pavilions that have suddenly opened all over the country are domestically produced. Merchants responded: sausages, bread, etc. cannot be imported into China.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Russian product stores are popping up all over the country like mushrooms after rain. Now there are at least 5 Russian-related stores in Nanjing alone.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, family members of the Rizhao Maternal and Child Health Hospital in Shandong Province held signs at the hospital gate with their children to protest their rights. It was reported online that a woman died during childbirth in the hospital, and the cause of death was unclear. The family members were not allowed to take the body away, so they held signs at the hospital gate to protest their rights. Currently, all the related videos on Douyin have been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The woman's TikTok video profile states that her father was severely beaten in a mental hospital:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The local government responded that the Tianmen Liangchang Nursing Home locked people in rooms, restricted personal freedom, and had no glass in the windows in winter. The village committee said: The nursing home is a rural welfare home, and all the residents are mentally disabled and too old. The town government said: The door was locked because some elderly people were depressed before, and the nursing home is currently privately contracted. The Civil Affairs Bureau: The situation will be reported to the leaders for handling. Netizens: This is worse than prison, no one should be treated like this.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a netizen complained that when he mentioned night riding in a chat with a friend, the police station called him to inquire about the situation, saying that the topic was "inflammatory". The blogger was later questioned by a school teacher.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the Chinese Football Association announced the second batch of teams that have completed debt repayment, indicating that all teams in the three-level Chinese football league have completed debt repayment. However, the list was questioned by many players as soon as it was announced. Former Guangzhou Evergrande captain Wei Shihao directly posted a question on Weibo @中国足球协, saying that he has not received his salary for the 2022 season. Two Guangzhou team players echoed on Weibo. Players from the Chinese Super League Cangzhou team also questioned how they passed the admission after being owed wages for four years.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 22, a netizen posted that during the annual gas meter replacement work, Shanghai Gas sent a third-party worker to the house, and due to work errors, the gas leaked at home, and the gas concentration once reached more than 5%. When he subsequently complained to Shanghai Gas for rights protection, the person in charge was unable to provide the qualification certificate of the operator and had a rude and bad attitude.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 27, Chen Yong, a flaw detection worker at Shandong Haomai Company who had been employed for less than a week, touched a gamma radiation source with his bare hands, and his hands were damaged by radiation and faced amputation. The company was not equipped with a personal radiation dosimeter or any protective labor protection measures, nor did it have relevant qualifications for radiation flaw detection. The flaw detection was carried out illegally on the side of the road outdoors, which may have exposed passers-by. After paying the initial treatment costs, the company refused any medical compensation and blocked the employee on WeChat. Chen Yong had no choice but to send a video for help.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A Taiwanese entrepreneur recently wrote a letter asking for help: Yunnan Yueshui Beverage Co., Ltd., which he invested in, has been forced to demolish and cut off water and electricity since April 2018, and no solution has been found so far, which has directly led to the company's complete suspension of production.
The company said: In the past six years, it has repeatedly protested and appealed to relevant departments, but all have been ignored. The attitude of ignoring corporate rights and interests and indifferent procrastination has completely destroyed our confidence in the rule of law environment on the mainland.
The person in charge of Yunnan Yueshui Beverage Co., Ltd. said angrily: "The forced demolition not only trampled on the legitimate rights and interests of the company, but also seriously damaged the livelihoods and lives of all our employees. This kind of arbitrary and reckless abuse of power by the local government is a ruthless suppression of Taiwanese companies and a complete trampling of the confidence of Taiwanese investors in the development of the mainland!"
This vicious incident not only affected our company itself, but also caused a strong response in the Taiwanese business circle and Taiwanese society. Many Taiwanese businessmen have expressed their concerns about the big...
fullContent:
台湾企业家近日发文求助：其投资的云南悦水饮品有限公司，自2018年4月以来，遭遇强拆并被断水断电，至今未得到任何解决，直接导致企业全面停产。
该企业称：过去六年，曾多次向相关部门提出抗议和诉求，但皆被无视。无视企业权益、冷漠拖延的态度，已经彻底摧毁了我们对大陆法治环境的信心。
云南悦水饮品有限公司负责人愤怒地表示：“强拆行为不仅践踏了企业合法权益，还严重破坏了我们全体员工的生计和生活。这种不顾后果、任意妄为的地方滥权行为，是对台资企业的一次无情打压，也是对台湾投资者在大陆发展信心的彻底践踏！”
这起恶性事件不仅影响了我们企业本身，更在台资企业圈和台湾社会中引发了强烈反响。许多台商纷纷表达了对大陆投资环境的深切担忧，认为类似事件的发生只会进一步恶化两岸经济合作的基础，直接威胁大陆吸引外资的努力。
更令人震惊的是，这一事件不仅侵害了企业的基本经营权，还严重影响了企业管理者和员工的基本生活。长达六年的断水断电，令我们的日常生活陷入混乱，无法保障最基本的生存需求。这种冷酷无情、缺乏基本人道精神的行为，难以令人相信发生在一个声称以法治为基础的现代化国家。
云南悦水饮品有限公司在此强烈谴责相关部门的滥权行为，并要求立即采取行动，恢复企业生产环境、补偿经济和精神损失，并严肃追究相关责任人的法律责任。我们呼吁大陆当局正视此事，采取切实行动，向台湾投资者和国际社会展现真正的法治和公平环境。
如果此类行为得不到纠正，台湾投资者对大陆的信任将不复存在，而大陆吸引外资的国际形象也将因这些恶性事件受到不可挽回的损害。我们坚决要求一个公平公正的解决方案，确保不再有任何合法企业因滥权行为而遭受这样的不公待遇！

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, Guo, a leader of the Xingye Securities Sales Department in Ningde City, Fujian Province, studied unknown drugs and injected them into employees during work, claiming that injections at this acupoint can prevent diseases.
An employee reported him for practicing medicine illegally, and Guo dismissed him for being incompetent.
Afterwards, Guo received administrative penalties for practicing medicine illegally, and all illegal gains were confiscated, but he continued to serve as a leader at Xingye Securities, and the employee who reported him for practicing medicine illegally was not able to return to his job.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 22, some residents of Chengzi Village, Yanqing District, Beijing, protested against the high heating fees compared to neighboring villages and the heating temperature was only 10 degrees, and their heating pipes were removed. In the cold winter in Beijing, it is impossible to live without heating
It is reported that the resettlement buildings of the villagers in Chengzi Village have not been built for 7 years after the demolition, and the penalty for delayed delivery in the contract has not been paid, resulting in the villagers being unable to pay for heating. Moreover, the village representatives and the village party secretary signed a contract with the heating company without informing the villagers. The content of the contract was unclear, the fees were higher than those of the neighboring community, and the heating temperature was only 10 degrees, which was not up to standard, causing dissatisfaction among the villagers, so the villagers refused to pay the heating company. Later, in order to collect the money, the heating company cut off the villagers' heating. On the 21st, the day of the winter solstice, the heating access was cut off the next day, December 22. The villagers called the police but it was useless and had no way to complain.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A diary written by a Chinese named "Cricket" who joined the Russian army. In his diary, he mentioned that he came to Russia to serve as a soldier in order to fight fascism, for money, and for Sino-Russian friendship.
But "the commander did not regard us as comrades, but as cannon fodder, and I did not get any money"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 22, Nanchang officials reported again on the "missing Li Yixue incident": she was diagnosed with obsessive-compulsive disorder and personality disorder.
In view of Li Yixue's current condition, the street community sent her to the hospital for treatment in accordance with the law on December 22.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 21, Kunming, Yunnan. Kunming South Railway Station at 6:30 in the morning. An old man pulling goods and a brightly dressed station attendant passing by formed a sharp contrast, sparking heated discussions among netizens.
The original video has been deleted by the platform.
